General.Name: AS Pro Kapital Grupp
General.Description: AS Pro Kapital Grupp, a real estate development company, develops, manages, purchases, and sells commercial and residential real estate properties in Estonia, Latvia, Germany, and Lithuania. The company develops and sells apartments; develops and leases retail and office premises, as well as develops shopping and entertainment centers in Tallinn; and provides maintenance and other services. It also operates a hotel in Germany. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

6.Name: Ms. Neringa  Rasimaviciene
6.Title: Managing Director of Pro Kapital Vilnius Real Estate Uab
